SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvancedBookingStrategy
Strategy for booking phones with advanced criteria.
BaseBookingStrategy
Abstract base class for booking strategies.
BatteryLevelCheck
A monitoring task that checks the battery level of a device.
Booking
Represents a booking record for a mobile phone.
BookingApplication
Main entry point for the Booking application.
BookingController
Controller for handling booking operations.
BookingManager
The com.example.booking.service.BookingManager class is responsible for managing the bookings of mobile phones.
BookingRequest
Represents a request for booking a mobile phone.
BookingResponse
Represents a response for a booking operation.
BookingStrategy
Defines the strategy for booking phones within a booking system.
BookingStrategyTest
Tests for SimpleBookingStrategy methods to ensure they correctly validate inputs.
DeviceContext
Represents the context of a device being monitored.
DeviceMetrics
Represents the key metrics of a device's current state.
DeviceMetricsSimulationService
Service responsible for simulating changes in device metrics.
DeviceMonitor
Manages and executes monitoring tasks for a single device.
DeviceMonitoringService
Service for monitoring device metrics such as battery level and memory usage.
DeviceMonitorTest
 
GlobalExceptionHandler
 
MemoryUsageCheck
A monitoring task that checks the memory usage of a device.
MobilePhone
The MobilePhone class represents a mobile phone entity within a booking system.
MobilePhoneAddedEvent
A custom application event that signifies a new mobile phone has been added to the application.
MobilePhoneController
REST Controller for managing mobile phones within the booking system.
MobilePhoneFactory
Factory class for creating instances of MobilePhone.
MobilePhoneRepository
Repository for managing a collection of MobilePhones.
MobilePhoneService
Service class for managing mobile phone operations.
MonitoringTask
Interface for defining monitoring tasks for devices.
PhoneModel
The PhoneModel annotation is used to designate methods or types that represent a specific mobile phone model within the mobile phone factory.
PhoneModelConfig
Configures and creates instances of various mobile phone models with model-specific default metrics.
PriorityBookingStrategy
Implements a priority-based booking strategy where certain users have higher priority for booking phones.
SimpleBookingStrategy
Implements a simple booking strategy using functional programming concepts.
SimpleBookingStrategyTest
Unit tests for SimpleBookingStrategy focusing on the booking process.
